product: Fire Tablet, 7 Display, Wi-Fi, 8 GB - Includes Special Offers, Magenta
intro: I am satisfied with the performance of my Kindle Fire tablet and ...
review: I am satisfied with the performance of my Kindle Fire tablet and it has exceeded all expectations in terms on functionality as well. I purchased one to use at home because we have no internet connection outside our house so that's why i bought an android device but now after using both devices,my opinion changed.The amazon fire was much better than any other kindles out there.the battery life lasted longer.it had more features.and its very easy user interface.i would recommend anyone who wants something different from regular tablets or smartphones buy these Kindle Fires they are awesome!

intro: I love it and recommend to everyone who want smart speaker, ...
review: I love it and recommend to everyone who want smart speaker, you can buy from here. Amazon echo - great gadget! It's easy set up & works well with Alexa voice commands...and the best part....you don't have any wires hanging around your house!!

product: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite - eBook reader - 4 GB - 6 monochrome Paperwhite - touchscreen - Wi-Fi - black
intro: I have been using it since last year and love the way you can read in full sunlight or ...
review: I have been using it since last year and love the way you can read in full sunlight or dark room, also very light weight compared to other kindles available at market place. This has become my daily companion when travelling abroad as well because of its lightweight, portability & battery life.I would recommend anyone who wants an e-book reading device with high quality display screen should buy one from amazon.com.This particular model comes along side many others but i feel that paper white version stands out among all due availability options such like color variants etc..

product: Amazon - Amazon Tap Portable Bluetooth and Wi-Fi Speaker - Black Amazon - Amazon Tap Portable Bluetooth and Wi-Fi Speaker - Black
intro: I like the fact that it has 4 different sound modes, ...
review: I like the fact that it has 4 different sound modes, you can change them to suit your mood or listening environment; plus there are several presets so all of those who live in my house have their own unique settings with no confusion! It's also very easy set up using Alexa (the voice assistant) which allows me total control from anywhere via any device: phone/tablet/PC/laptop etc...I'm sure others will find similar benefits as well but overall if they're looking at buying an Echo Dot then get one too because when used together both devices become much more useful than either could be alone!! The only downside was some issues getting setup properly initially due mostly likely being new users ourselves although after reading reviews here we were able resolve most problems within minutes once figured out what needed doing

product: Amazon Fire Tv Amazon Fire Tv
intro: but what i like most was how easy they made setting up my amazon account ...
review: I bought it because of the price and that you can use any device to connect with your fire tv, but what i like most was how easy they made setting up my amazon account so simple! It's also very intuitive when using features such as voice search or other functions on there devices. What do people think are some good uses? Well one thing we've used quite often has been making reservations at restaurants by just asking Alexa "Alexa make me reservation" then she will give us options based off our location (in town) if its available online etc.. We have even asked her questions regarding weather conditions in different locations around Florida...she'll tell u where all kinds o' rainbows & sunshine! I would recommend buying an extra battery pack since sometimes batteries die out during long sessions.. Overall great purchase!!! If only more companies were doing things similar!! This unit works perfectly!! Easy

product: Fire Kids Edition Tablet, 7 Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB, Green Kid-Proof Case
intro: My kids love this tablet!! Very easy to set up and use!!
review: I think that it's good to buy the kids tablet because they can play games and watch videos on their own but also have fun with parents or grandparents when you are not around them.I recommend buying one of these tablets if your child want something more than just playing video game like Pokemon Go. I bought my daughter an apple ipad mini as her Christmas present last year (2014). She loves everything she has ever owned from toys, books & movies etc.. It was great having all those things at once in such small space! This new kindle fire looks amazing! Love how easy its set up!! And so much faster!! Also love being able tp add apps without paying extra money every month!!! Great purchase!!! This kid friendly Fire HD8 Android powered Kindle reader comes loaded w/ tons o' free
